channel.title: Client Hacking
channel.description:
I recently became interested in client hacking and or making bots (kinda the same thing) Can someone please redirect me in the right direction to learn this from the basics (or how you learned it and feel is the easiest way to learn it)
Do not just say send packets to the server from the client Redirect Me Do not say search cause i did ( just want to know what people feel is the best way to go about this)
Also if you take bombs cheat client and update or add more packets would it be able to work again? ( or rather work on newer servers?) Or should you just use the client that is meant for the server and analyze how bombs constructed his client?
And would it be very hard to make a rsps bot like a simple login and logs back in if logged out and thieves an banks or something? or fishes and banks?

item.title: Client Hacking
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Making colour bots are harder than all the other types out there that are commonly used I’ve heard.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Hacking
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

Don’t get ahead of yourself.
http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/reallybigindex.html

Read full topic

item.title: Client Hacking
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:2, topic:437145”]It’s extremely easy, yes. People make bots for RuneScape, right?

It is pointless and retarded, because, why in the hell would you want to cheat on a private server? That’s just stupid.[/quote]I wouldn’t say that, some larger servers have a market for gold buyers that is quite large and profitable.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Hacking
item.dc:creator: @_s11 s1gma
item.description:
@_s11 wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:8, topic:437145”][quote author=whackatre link=topic=539859.msg3952566#msg3952566 date=1332422149]
Suppose his intent was for educational purposes…? I would also like to learn networking + packets sometime.
[/quote]

That’s needed to make a Private Server, you can’t get out of that if you ever want to write your own Framework.

And, starting on a Private Server to make a bot is a bad idea, the RSPS client and RuneScape’s client are extremely different.[/quote]the concepts for building certain types of bots are still the same, except you don’t have to play catchup with an rsps’s client updating all the time.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2

@Crown2 wrote:

[quote=“amfg, post:9, topic:437145”]Making bots for private servers is easy because most of them have shit all in the way of prevention.

You should take a look at the Aryan source code.[/quote]

yes i want to make a simple bot for a rs private server but all i seem to find is like making scripts that import rsbot or something like that i want to make a original one for a specific private server?

Read full topic
